problem.markdown:
Which of the below describes the Zipf/Power Law Distribution? ( ) The amount a site is accessed can generally be represented by a line. ( ) Most users access the site equally. (x) There is one really active user, then the next is half as active, and so on. ( ) Sites often see a distinctive drop in usage after their top 5% of users.
[explanation] The Zipf/Power Law Distribution is shown on practically any web page. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the below describes the Zipf/Power Law Distribution?

choicegroup.choice: The amount a site is accessed can generally be represented by a line.
Most users access the site equally.
There is one really active user, then the next is half as active, and so on.
Sites often see a distinctive drop in usage after their top 5% of users.

div.p: The Zipf/Power Law Distribution is shown on practically any web page.
